title: 初恋 (First Love)
lyrics: ana ta no koto wa nan demo shitteru to omot teta bukiy ou na koto mo nekojita na koto m o denwa ga nigate n a koto mo anata ga mou watashi no koto wo suki ja na i to i u ko to itsu ka ra surechi gatte shim atta no kana dous hite kitsuke nakatta no kana futari sugoshita takusan no omoi de korekara m o zutto issho ni iru to omot teta anat a wa tomodachi kyou kara tomodachi mou nido to suki nan te iwanai kara kore ijo u tooku ni ika naide mou miru d ake demo kamawa nai dakara mou aenai nante iw anaide onegai
